name: Last Life (DarkBloodbane)
description:
This is my entry for Ludum Dare 50 : Delay the inevitable

Story : You will die soon, nothing can change that. However, you can delay your death by doing some deeds.

Heal civilians and protect them from demons while killing demons yourself.

Control scheme:

Numpad keys = walk around.

X = shoots hurting shot;  Can hit demons and civilians.

Z = shoots healing shot;  Can heal demons and civilians.

C = heals self.

Enter = Confirm/Pause the game.

F8 = Take screenshot.

Features:

- Can shoot either hurting shot or healing shot.

- Can heal self.

- Multiple levels.
